datapoint.title: Personal Site
datapoint.md:
I've built this using Google's Angularjs.

Posts are written in a markdown section of YAML files. As are these data objects.
YAML is being used to wrap additional metadata such as tags, project association, and
inter 'datapoint' linking.

Markdown is parsed by Showdown and YAML is parsed by js-yaml.

My primary goal is to use this information system as a replacement for how I currently
use my bookmarks in Google Chrome.
